Version.Description: Retrieves the version of the DeveloperKit.

Ping.Description: Pings a specific IP and returns the response time in milliseconds.

ConnectedToWifi?.Description: Indicates whether the user is currently connected to Wi-Fi.

ConnectedToInternet?.Description: Indicates whether the user is currently connected to the internet.

Location.Description: Quickly and simply retrieves the userâ€™s current location.

Timezone.Description: Retrieves the timezone of the user.

UserLanguage.Description: Retrieves the preferred language of the user.

GetUserName.Description: Retrieves the username of the user.

Draw.Description: Allows the user to draw on a blank page.
